name: play
description: Play songs, artists, albums, playlists or podcasts on a media provider.

query.description: Content that the user is looking for. Must be a non-empty string, even for generic types.

intent_type.description: The type of content to play. One of: "ALBUM", "ARTIST", "GENERIC_MUSIC", "GENERIC_PODCAST", "GENERIC_MUSIC_NEW", "GENERIC_SOMETHING_ELSE", "LIKED_SONGS", "PERSONAL_PLAYLIST", "PODCAST_EPISODE", "PODCAST_SHOW", "PUBLIC_PLAYLIST", "TRACK".

filtering_type.description: The type of content to filter by. One of: "ALBUM", "PLAYLIST", "TRACK".

name: search
description: Search for songs, artists, albums, playlists or podcasts on a media provider.

query.description: Content that the user is looking for. Must be a non-empty string, even for generic types.

intent_type.description: The type of content to search for. One of: "ALBUM", "ARTIST", "GENERIC_MUSIC", "GENERIC_PODCAST", "GENERIC_MUSIC_NEW", "GENERIC_SOMETHING_ELSE", "LIKED_SONGS", "PERSONAL_PLAYLIST", "PODCAST_EPISODE", "PODCAST_SHOW", "PUBLIC_PLAYLIST", "TRACK".

filtering_type.description: The type of content to filter by. One of: "ALBUM", "PLAYLIST", "TRACK".
